name: Hotline Harvest
description:
Controls: W,A,S,D - Movement, Mouse- Buy, Attack, Number keys (1,2,3,4,5) - Switch weapons

Take control of Leonard (not mentioned in the game) as he takes on hordes of pests who want to destroy his beautiful wheat field.

Programming,Art - Phil S.

Music - Crusader Kings 3

Sfx- counter strike, Ace of spades, mixkit.com , Me
